article_title: Onslow Memorial removed from BlueCross value plan network
article_text:
Where to go?

The Blue Value plan is accepted at other general, acute-care hospitals outside Onslow County:



Pender Memorial Hospital in Burgaw



Vidant Duplin Hospital in Kenansvi...

» Read more

article_metadata.description:
A popular low-cost health-insurance plan now excludes Onslow Memorial Hospital from its network for coverage of routine procedures.
"(The hospital) is out-of-network for the Blue Value plan from BlueCross and BlueShield of North Carolina as of January," hospital spokeswoman Amy Sousa said.
The plan is the cheapest at BlueCross, according to information from the insurance company.
Blue Value is marketed as a plan that has a limited network of providers to help lower monthly costs.
Eight local
article_metadata.author: Michael Todd
